title: Dia 4 with 17 lp demoted to d5 with 75lp?
body:
I played solo q was dia 4 with 17lp played the game lost bcs adc went afk/dc. After the game it said that i got demoted to dia 5. How is this possible yester day I had 2 promos to dia 3 both failed, and now i get demoted with 17lp. I have never lost a game in dia 4 with 0lp so this either is a bug or idk.
Someone pls explain.

replies.body: Sorry to hear about the leaver in that match.  :/  I looked into this for you to see what happened exactly, and it just looks like a bad streak.  Upon reaching 0 LP, matchmaking demoted you down a division.  Getting a demotion sucks, but nothing really seems out of the ordinary here.  More info can also be found through our [Ranked Play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ).  Hope that helps clears things up, and best of luck on the ladderboard!

I think what he is referring to is that he got demoted at 17 lp, not at 0 lp.  He never saw his account drop to 0 lp.  In other words, he went from 17lp to demotion.  Not from 0lp to demotion.  To verify, even your FAQ specifies you have to play a game at 0lp to be demoted, even just one game:

"Demotion occurs if you lose enough matches at 0 LP in a division or tier."

I think Porocles was saying he was at 17lp at the start of the match, but losing that match dropped MaxILok to 0lp and that's what triggered the demotion. 

Am I interpreting that wrong?
I was at 17lp and in 1 single game went from 17lp to d5 75lp. Where is the demotion shield?
That is exactly what I was trying to say. Im just confused how did it happen it has to be a bug in the system.
SO baisicly when having a bad streak it is possible to demote as soon as you hit 0lp. The 0lp shield doesnt count then?
